casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Jaime LOPEZ-MENDOZA, Appellant. 2018-541 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided June 7, 2018

***1074Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Christina A. Swarns, Office of the Appellate Defender, 11 Park Place, Suite 1601, New York, NY 10007 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
